title: A Scrap of paper and a piece of string
creator_credit: John Korty and Exploring for the National Broadcasting Company
brief_description: An animated film about a scrap of paper which boasts of being more useful than a piece of string. However, after turning into a paper boat and getting blown over in the water, the paper finds the string of use after all. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
